class.name: willbot_controllers/CartesianAdmittanceController
class.description: A controller that renders a mass-spring-damper system in cartesian space.

class.name: willbot_controllers/CartesianVelocityController
class.description: A controller that executes a motion based on cartesian velocities.

class.name: willbot_controllers/JointVelocityController
class.description: A controller that executes a motion based on joint velocities.

class.name: willbot_controllers/PerformanceController
class.description: A controller that publishes current control time step.
